events.summary: You encounter a large boulder blocking your way.

A.action: Lift the boulder out of your path.
succeed: You effortlessly toss the boulder aside
fail: HP -3
You move the big rock, but hurt your back in the process.

succeed: You're slippery, like a snake, you slip past the obstacle.
fail: DEX -1
You get through but twist an ankle, not as nimble as you thought.

succeed: You blast your way through the blocking stone.
fail: HP -10
You got the boulder alright, and yourself, and everything else nearby. Always check your spell radius.

D.action: The boulder is not real, you are not real, simply walk through it.
succeed: You walk straight through the boulder, and find a new toy inside.
fail: die
You get halfway through the giant rock before you realise what you're doing is impossible. You're trapped in stone with no air.

events.summary: The cave you're in has a large chasm impeding progress.

succeed: With a running start and powerful legs you soar through the air and clear the gap.
fail: HP -6,weapon
You gracefully leap into the air and not so gracefully plummet into the pit. There's a weapon down here at least, if you survived the fall.

B.action: Use a grappling hook to swing across.
succeed: Your expert use of a grappling hook. Your majestic swing. Your perfect landing. If anyone was around to see it, they'd be very impressed.
fail: HP -6,weapon
Using a grappling hook actually takes practice, it turns out. You land on an old skeleton, something shiny in its hand.

C.action: Use magic to levitate across the gap.
succeed: You casually walk over the hole and touch down safely on the other side.
fail: HP -6,weapon
While crossing you bump into a stalactite, which breaks your concentration. You fall into the hole. There's a weapon down here at least, if you survived the fall.

succeed: You do what? How do you even... Wait you killed it? And it dropped gold?
fail: HP -6,weapon
You attack with all your might and tumble into the pit. How else was this going to turn out? The remains of some other fools lay here. You could loot them if you are still alive.

events.summary: You've come up against a large metal door. A console in the connecting wall blinks on.

succeed: All it takes is one punch and the door comes down. Damn, you're buff.
fail: HP -5
Thud. The door doesn't budge. That's a broken hand, for sure.

B.action: Hack the console. Hack the door. Hack the world.
succeed: Turns out there's an open button on the console, but you make it look like you're doing cool hacking.
fail: COOL -1
What's less cool than a nerd? A nerd who can't even get this door open.

C.action: Hack the console. Like, with an axe.
succeed: You <attack> the machine in just the right way. The door slides open.
fail: You <attack> the console and thoroughly destroy it. Hopefully nothing good was behind that door.

succeed: Wow, you know exactly what to say to get those fans whirring. The console opens the door for you, and gives you its number.
fail: HOT -1,COOL -1
In hindsight, seducing a machine was probably never going to work. But the rejection isn't any less damaging to your ego.

events.summary: For your valiant deeds, the Queen bestows upon you a weapon of great might: a **<weapon>**.

succeed: 'Put it to good use' the Queen says as she hands over your new weapon.

B.action: You are worth more than this garbage. Refuse.
succeed: You bin your prize and walk away. The Queen begins a slow clap that leads into a standing ovation from the court.
fail: die
The Queen has you executed for your insolence.

events.summary: While exploring a dungeon you come across a chest alone in a room.

succeed: You open the chest and it's not a trap!
You destroy the chest and its contents. There could've been something good inside.

events.summary: While exploring a dungeon you come across a chest alone in a room.

succeed: Well that was clearly a mimic, you can tell by the chain, and that it ate you.
You know a mimic when you see one, which gives you the advantage. You <attack> that fool. You take its treasure from its corpse.
fail: HP -5
You correctly identify the mimic, but not whether you can actually best one in combat.

events.summary: While exploring a dungeon you come across a chest alone in a room.

succeed: You open the chest and hear a click, you swiftly dodge aside as a bolt flies out. You'll not be bested by a chest.
fail: HP -3
You're so happy that the chest isn't a mimic that you fail to notice the comical spring loaded boxing glove until it hits you in the abdomen, knocking you clear out of the room.

succeed: You destroy the chest and its contents. There could've been something good inside.

events.summary: You find a skeleton holding a potion bottle.

fail: WEIRD 2
That tasted unlike anything you've ever tasted before. Not good though, you feel a bit off. Has one of your arms always been a tentacle?

succeed: It's good practice to have no business with skeletons.

events.summary: You find yourself in a local chapel, with time to spare.

succeed: You feel the blessings of the gods.
fail: HP 3
Doesn't seem like the gods are listening today, but a priest takes pity on you and bestows a minor blessing.
The gods do not reward greed, most of the time.
HOT 1
You don't feel any more buff, but you do notice some of the clergy checking you out.

succeed: You take a nap in a confessional booth. You awake to a man in the other booth mid confession. He compliments your ability to listen.
fail: COOL -1
You're kicked out by a very angry nun.

events.summary: You are accosted by some goblins.

succeed: You <attack> those goblins and make short work of them.
fail: HP -7
Bested by gobins, how embarrassing.

B.action: Attempt to resolve your differences with words.
succeed: The goblins take to you well, and count you as one of their own.
fail: COOL -1
Even goblins don't want to hang out with you.

succeed: You escape with your life, but not your pride.
fail: HP -3
You get away from the goblins, they don't even chase you. But you do trip and hurt yourself in the process.

events.summary: In the sky! A Dragon! It descends upon you.

A.action: Oh what a story this will be! Attack!
succeed: An epic showdown ensues but in the end you <attack> the mighty dragon and bring it down.
fail: HP -30
You try your best, you even get some good hits in. But when the dragon unleashes its fiery breath you don't stand a chance.

succeed: You've got a way with words and make a great impression on the dragon. You arrange a monthly tea time. Word of your charm spreads far.
fail: die
You do not impress the dragon. And you've let your guard down.
die
You should have counted your coins, dragons don't like being insulted like this.

D.action: This is a fight you can't win. Run!
succeed: Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge. You escape unscathed.
fail: HP -15
You get away, barely. But you're covered in cuts and bruises, and some of the dragon fire got you.

events.summary: The ruin you're exploring already has some bandits inside.

A.action: Good, you were looking for something to fight.
succeed: You <attack> your way through the bandits. And loot their gold.
fail: HP -12
These bandits are tough, or maybe you're just weak.

succeed: You're as quiet as a mouse, and get to the treasure first.
fail: HP -5
They hear you. You flee but catch an arrow in the ass.

succeed: They were here first, after all.

events.summary: You're in the city shopping, I hope you brought your gold.

succeed: This town has a weird system, you pay for the weapon before you see it.
fail: COOL -1
'This isn't enough', the clerk says. You grab your gold and leave in a hurry.

succeed: Yum, it tastes like your favourite fruit.
fail: COOL -1
'This isn't enough', the clerk says. You grab your gold and leave in a hurry.

succeed: The taste is bitter but the warm feeling it gives is intoxicating.
fail: COOL -2
'Please don't waste our time', the entire store is judging you.

succeed: Nothing catches your eye, or you're too broke.

events.summary: Oh no! <ally> is hanging off a cliff edge, barely holding on.

succeed: You pull them up. The audience cheers. You give them the gun show.
fail: allydie,die
You grab hold of them, but you slip. You both fall.

B.action: Leave them to it, it's not your problem.
succeed: 'They'll be fine', you think as you walk away.
You successfully cast the spell. <ally> finds some gold at the bottom and gives it to you as a reward.
fail: allydie
You cast the spell, but it's only when you hear the thud at the bottom of the cliff that you realise you cast it on yourself.

events.summary: An orc horde is bearing down on you and <ally>. You are facing impossible odds, with no time to run.

succeed: You work together in perfect unison. Orcs die by the hundreds before you. You take the warchief's weapon from his body.
fail: allydie,die
It's beautiful. It happens in slow motion of course. You each take down dozens before you succomb to your wounds.

B.action: Tell them to run. You'll hold the orcs off.
succeed: Anyone else would have fallen here. But the orcs weren't counting on you. You stride away from the battlefield, covered in blood. None of it yours.
fail: die,title 50
You are true to your word, no orc gets past you while you still draw breath. Which is more than long enough for your ally to escape.

C.action: Run while they fight the orcs.
succeed: You hear them curse your name as you dash away. But at least you're alive.
fail: allydie,die
You leave your friend to die. But you're not actually fast enough to escape.

events.summary: You find yourself in a small room with glass walls. In an adjacent room is <ally>. A console in your room presents options.

A.action: Swap lives, everything but your name.
succeed: A bright flash of light and everything about you has changed. Hopefully this is something you both wanted.
fail: allygen,gen
A bright flash of light and everything about you has changed. Something must have gone wrong, you don't recognise yourself.
HP -20,allyHP 20
You're not so good at the computers, you give more than you intended.

succeed: They have it to spare, right?
fail: HP 5,allyHP -5
You only manage to steal 5 HP, was it worth it?

succeed: The doors to both rooms open. You're free to leave.
fail: allydie
The door to your room opens. But your neighbour is gone, and so is the floor in their room. Which button did you press?

events.summary: An evil lord has thrown you and <ally> into an arena and ordered you to fight to the death.

A.action: Your story cannot end here. Go all out!
succeed: The fight is intense. Nobody can tell who will win. The crowd cheers with every blow. Seeing an opening you <attack> your opponent and they finally fall.
fail: die
You fall to your knees. You had an opening, you're sure of it. Perhaps you hesitated. Your opponent approaches. Over the roar of the crowd you think you hear them say "I'm sorry".

B.action: Declare your eternal love for your opponent. You will not fight. They will have to kill you both.
succeed: The crowd loves it, love found on the battlefield. To avoid risking a revolt the lord announces you as joint victors.
fail: allydie,die
They do. They do kill you both.

C.action: The lord presides over the spectical. In the open. You've practiced this manoeuvre. If your opponent launches you into the air just right you can reach him.
succeed: You charge as if to attack. Your ally drops to a crouch and holds their shield above their head. You jump and they push up. The lord's face is filled with surprise and terror as you fly right at him.
fail: die
You are launched into the air, but fall just short. Unfortunately the walls of this arena are lined with spikes. <ally> is declare the winner by default.

succeed: They send in the troops and you <attack> your way through them. When he sees how well you're doing the lord makes a swift exit. You and <ally> leave the arena alive, a trail of bodies behidn you.
fail: HP -12,allyHP -12
It's tough going getting out, there seems to be an endless supply of guards. You take some bad hits, but eventually get away. You finally stop to rest in a clearing in the woods.

events.summary: You've finally found it, the hidden tomb. Rumoured to be the resting place of <ally>.

A.action: Their work is unfinished. Say a prayer of resurrection.
succeed: The tomb is bathed in golden light as you say the words. Darkness returns as you finish, and nothing happens. You sit down, defeated. At least you gave it your all. Then the coffin stirs.
fail: WIS 1
You pray your hardest. You feel the power of the gods flowing through you into the room. But it is not enough. Maybe they're too long gone, maybe you have more to learn.

succeed: Some people wouldn't dare loot the dead, but you're not above some old fashioned grave digging. You get some gold and trinkets for your trouble.
fail: GOLD 20,HP -10,allyrevive
You make your way through the tomb, checking every corner. You find some gold here and there... Wait, was that coffin always open? You're hit by something from the darkness.

C.action: You can rebuild them. You have the technology.
succeed: The tomb is filled with the sound of power tools. You replace flesh with metal. You wire circuitry to organs. Eventually a cry is heard echoing through the halls: "It's alive".
fail: TECH 1,INT 1
In the end all you really manage to to drill some metal into a corpse. A good learning experience at least.

D.action: Challenge the coffin to a game of cards. If you win it has to release its prisoner.
succeed: You play the best you ever have. Your poker face is impenetrable. But it's close, the tide looks to be turning against you. And then you see it, your opening. SNAP!
fail: WEIRD 1,HP -3
You are found days later, surrounded by playing cards. You whisper to the rescue team 'I fold'.

events.summary: You're a contestant in the final round of 'Don't Drink the Milk!'. The last task is to eat a spicy pepper.

succeed: You bite into the pepper and... it's not that bad. You expected worse. You play it up for the crowd though and they eat it up. You are the winner.
fail: GOLD 10,HP -1
Hot! Too hot! It burns! You chug the milk and place second.

B.action: Eat the pepper whole, without chewing.
succeed: Swallowing a whole pepper without anything to wash it down isn't easy, but you manage it. You win and feel a little bit smarter.
fail: die
I'll spare you the gruesome details, but you choke on a pepper on a gameshow.

C.action: Pretend to eat the pepper and hide it up your sleeve.
succeed: Clever plan. And they seem to buy it. You make chewing motions and fake struggle with the heat. You win and have a pepper saved for later.
fail: COOL -1
Nobody is fooled, the crowd boos and you're disqualified.

succeed: Too spicy for you. You'll take the runner up prize.
